命令行调用扫描仪扫描文档
How to Scan Documents from the Command Line
The article shares how to scan documents from the command line using APIs like TWAIN, WIA, ICA, SANE and eSCL on Windows, macOS and Linux.
本文分享了如何在Windows、macOS和Linux上使用TWAIN、WIA、ICA、SANE和eSCL等API从命令行调用扫描仪扫描文档。
The article shares how to scan documents from the command line using APIs like TWAIN, WIA, ICA, SANE and eSCL on Windows, macOS and Linux.
In this article, we are going to talk about how to scan documents from the command line (CLI), which allows scanning and saving documents to be automated and/or scripted.
在本文中，我们将讨论如何从命令行（CLI）扫描文档，以便自动化文档扫描工作或者集成扫描功能到其它应用中。
In this article, we are going to talk about how to scan documents from the command line (CLI), which allows scanning and saving documents to be automated and/or scripted.
There are different APIs to access document scanners and here is a table about them.
有不同的API可以访问文档扫描仪，下面是一张对比表格。
There are different APIs to access document scanners and here is a table about them.
高级控制（ADF、条形码检测等）
We are going to use all the APIs to scan documents from the command line.
我们将使用这些API从命令行扫描文档。
We are going to use all the APIs to scan documents from the command line.
Since only SANE provides a command-line tool and the others do not, we need to write command-line tools to use the other APIs.
由于只有SANE提供了命令行工具，而其他没有，因此我们需要编写命令行工具来使用其他API。
Since only SANE provides a command-line tool and the others do not, we need to write command-line tools to use the other APIs.
Acquire an image with a specified scanner.
使用指定的扫描仪获取图像。
Acquire an image with a specified scanner.
Command line tools of the other APIs we are going to write will have the same usage.
我们将要编写的其他API的命令行工具将具有相同的用法。
Command line tools of the other APIs we are going to write will have the same usage.
The TWAIN interface is implemented with C++ and has a Python library.
TWAIN接口是用C++实现的，并有一个Python库。
The TWAIN interface is implemented with C++ and has a Python library.
We are going to use Python to write the command-line tool.
我们将使用Python编写命令行工具。
We are going to use Python to write the command-line tool.

WIA provides APIs as well as a COM layer.
WIA provides APIs as well as a COM layer.
We are going to use Python and COM to use WIA.
We are going to use Python and COM to use WIA.
以下是关键部分的代码：
The network scanners broadcast themselves via Bonjour and the client can find them and send HTTP requests to scan documents.
网络扫描仪通过Bonjour进行广播，客户端可以找到它们并发送HTTP请求来扫描文档。
The network scanners broadcast themselves via Bonjour and the client can find them and send HTTP requests to scan documents.
We are going to use Python as well to write the scanning tool.
我们也将使用Python编写扫描工具。
We are going to use Python as well to write the scanning tool.
List scanners by detecting Bonjour services whose type is <g1>_uscan._tcp.local.</g1>.
通过检测类型为<g1>_uscan_tcp.local.</g1>的Bonjour服务来列出扫描仪。
List scanners by detecting Bonjour services whose type is <g1>_uscan._tcp.local.</g1>.
The scanning configuration is expressed in XML.
The scanning configuration is expressed in XML.
Using the Image Capture API is a bit complicated, we are going to create a Swift command-line project to implement the tool.
使用Image Capture API稍微复杂点，我们将创建一个Swift命令行项目来实现该工具。
Using the Image Capture API is a bit complicated, we are going to create a Swift command-line project to implement the tool.
以下是关键部分的代码：
Create a scanner manager class to list the scanners.
创建叫ScannerManager的类以列出扫描仪。
Create a scanner manager class to list the scanners.
Let the manager class inherit <g1>ICScannerDeviceDelegate</g1> and add the scanning-related functions.
让这个类继承<g1>ICScannerDeviceDelegate</g1>并添加与扫描相关的函数。
Let the manager class inherit <g1>ICScannerDeviceDelegate</g1> and add the scanning-related functions.
<g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1> provides a RESTful API feature for scanning documents using TWAIN, WIA, SANE, ICA or eSCL.
<g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1>提供RESTful API功能，支持使用TWAIN、WIA、SANE、ICA和eSCL等API扫描文档。
<g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1> provides a RESTful API feature for scanning documents using TWAIN, WIA, SANE, ICA or eSCL.
You can find its details on <g2>this page</g2>.
您可以在<g2>这个页面</g2>上找到它的详细信息。
You can find its details on <g2>this page</g2>.
Here are the benefits of using Dynamic Web TWAIN's RESTful API:
以下是使用Dynamic Web TWAIN的RESTful API的好处：
Here are the benefits of using Dynamic Web TWAIN's RESTful API:
One unified interface to use all the mainstream document scanning APIs with complete scanner controls on different platforms.
提供了调用主流的扫描API的统一接口，支持控制扫描仪的各种功能，支持不同平台。
One unified interface to use all the mainstream document scanning APIs with complete scanner controls on different platforms.
Share scanners via the network so that mobile devices can also access document scanners.
通过网络共享扫描仪，这样移动设备也可以访问文档扫描仪。
Share scanners via the network so that mobile devices can also access document scanners.
We can use programming languages we like to use the document scanning APIs.
支持各种编程语言去使用文档扫描功能。
We can use programming languages we like to use the document scanning APIs.
Here are the key parts using the <g1>Python wrapper</g1>:
以下是使用<g1>Python版封装</g1>的关键部分的代码：

Import the library and declare several variables.
导入库并声明有关变量。
Import the library and declare several variables.

Apart from the RESTful API, Dynamic Web TWAIN also provides a JavaScript library with a dedicated viewer, complete wrapping of the document scanning APIs, local cache and various supplementary APIs to provide a browser-based document scanning solution.
除了RESTful API，Dynamic Web TWAIN还提供了一个JavaScript库，该库具有专用的文档查看器、完整的文档扫描API包装、本地缓存和各种补充API，以提供基于浏览器的文档扫描解决方案。

Apart from the RESTful API, Dynamic Web TWAIN also provides a JavaScript library with a dedicated viewer, complete wrapping of the document scanning APIs, local cache and various supplementary APIs to provide a browser-based document scanning solution.
<g1>Visit its online demo</g1> to have a try.
